attributes.action: Reintroduction Of The Death Penalty For Inhumane Crimes
attributes.additional_details: I the undersigned believe that the death penalty should be able to be imposed by high court judges where there is conclusive DNA evidence for the most serious crimes such as child murder and mass murder. I believe that the judges that sentenced convicted killers such as Ian huntly, roy whiting and Peter sutcluffe should have had the power to serve The death penalty and give true justice to the family's of the victims.
